item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post via applying hugo to build static pages, and the theme is coder.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Alex! I was working as a R&D engineer in a medical service process startup, where I was responsible for biomedical signal algorithm development and handled some project management tasks. I have a master’s degree in Brain Science from National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University. I have experience in brain science, intelligent healthcare big data, and specialize in physiological signal analysis, nonlinear science, medical AI. I have dual bachelor’s degrees in Aeronautics and Astronautics (AA) and Psychology from National Cheng Kung University.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: ycy1997alex@gmail.com LinkedIn: chunyenyu1997 GitHub: ycy1997alex

item.title: Projects
item.description: PROJECT EXPERIENCE Link to heading 2023/02 ~ 2023/06 Project Link to heading Identifying Key Features for Sleep Quality Prediction Before Sleeping Developed an algorithm and established a pipeline from signal extraction devices to analysis 2022/07 ~ 2023/04 Project Link to heading Sleep Enhancement Service Process Planning and Development Planned the sleep service process and developed auxiliary software tools RESEARCH PROJECT EXPERIENCE Link to heading 2020/07 ~ 2021/12 Side Project Link to heading Predicting Model of Pentagon Drawing of Mini-Mental State Examination
